alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lonoke; Pulaski (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 08 at 8:19PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lonoke, northwestern Jefferson and southeastern Pulaski Counties through 845 PM CST... At 819 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over White Hall, or near Pine Bluff, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... White Hall... England... Keo... Warbritton... Pine Bluff Arsenal... Hensley Island... Coy... Sherrill... Tucker... Pastoria... Bredlow Corner... Wright... Tomberlin... Lock and Dam 5 Park... Tar Camp Park... Samples... Hardin... Ferda... Dexter... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for central and southeastern Arkansas.
